scripts.test: yarn  lint && yarn  tsc-test && yarn  jest
scripts.demo:one: cd manual/Website1; yarn && yarn link webpack-external-import && yarn manual:dev
scripts.demo:one:prod: cd manual/Website1; yarn && yarn link webpack-external-import && yarn manual:prod
scripts.demo:one:fast: cd manual/Website1; yarn link webpack-external-import && yarn manual:dev
scripts.demo:two: cd manual/Website2; yarn && yarn link webpack-external-import && yarn manual:dev
scripts.demo:two:prod: cd manual/Website2; yarn && yarn link webpack-external-import && yarn manual:prod
scripts.demo:two:fast: cd manual/Website2; yarn link webpack-external-import && yarn manual:dev
scripts.demo: yarn && yarn && yarn link webpack-external-import && concurrently "yarn compile" "yarn link" "yarn demo:one"  "yarn demo:two"
scripts.demo:debug: npx kill-port 3200 | yarn && yarn && yarn link webpack-external-import && concurrently "yarn compile" "yarn link" "yarn demo:one"  "yarn demo:two"
scripts.demo:prod: yarn && yarn compile && yarn link && yarn demo:one:prod | yarn demo:two:prod
scripts.demo:fast: yarn compile && yarn link && yarn demo:one:fast | yarn demo:two:fast
scripts.babel: yarn compile && cd manual && yarn babel
